title: High Market Competition Score
description: In 2024, Costa Rica achieved a high overall score of 68.55 in market competition according to the B-READY index, indicating a strong competitive market environment.

title: High Implementation of Market Competition Services
description: Costa Rica scored 69.81 in 2024 for the implementation of key services promoting market competition, reflecting effective market policies.

title: Significant Government Expenditure on Education
description: In 2021, Costa Rica allocated 31.17% of its government expenditure to education, highlighting its commitment to educational investment.

title: High Coverage of Unemployment Benefits in 4th Quintile
description: In 2022, 21.34% of the population in the 4th quintile in Costa Rica was covered by unemployment benefits and active labor market programs.

title: Low Net Official Flows from UNWOMEN
description: In 2021, Costa Rica had a net official flow of -$1,366 from UNWOMEN, indicating a low level of financial support from this UN agency.
